meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7545.

td.p: Erin Mewes, a homemaker from Bristow, Virginia
Miles Lake, a biology student from Pasadena, California
Joe Nguyen, an attorney from New York, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $50,001)

tr.td: CELEBRITY MEMOIRS
HOUSEHOLD VOCABULARY
I USED TO RUN THE PLACE
(Alex: You name the country.)
GET SOME EXERCISE!
ARCHAEOLOGY
SPEAKING "FRENCH"
